outputs.output_descr: The Terminal Phase out Management Program (TPMP) Project is aimed at providing assistance to the government of Malawi to completely phase out use of CFCs in the refrigeration sector. Under component 3 of the TPMP the  project  will srengthen 3 Regional Retrofit Centres. Each centre will be supplied with a sufficient quantity of correct tools and equipment, to assist in the permanent retrofitting of CFC domestic refrigeration and MAC units. Secondly the project will provide Technical Assistance   through the employment an international consultant and two national consultants who will conduct   Training of Trainer (TOT) and refrigeration technicians training workshops.  Thirdly, the project will provide, where possible financial incentives to a few selected refrigeration end users with commercial and industrial CFC installations to permanently retrofit or convert these installations to use very low ODP or non-ODP refrigerants.

project_title: Terminal Phase Out_Management Plan for Malawi
